isFreeGateSign.title: Free Gate Sign
isFreeGateSign.description: every property receive free gate sign. Additional signs can be ordered on line.

isEmergencyWarning.title: Emergency Warning
isEmergencyWarning.description: In the event of an accident or incident simply press the Emergency button to have all people inside the geofenced property notified to meet at the 'Rally Point'

isVisitorLogbook.title: Visitor Logbook
isVisitorLogbook.description: All records are automated on entering & leaving a geofence. All records are automatically sent to the logbook on entering and leaving a geofence. These records can be exported as a PDF or CSV.

isEcvd.title: eCVD
isEcvd.description: A complete record of all movements of Grain, Stockfeed or Fodder. All records are stored as a PDF or CSV and can be transferred easily.

isElwd.title: eLWD
isElwd.description: A complete record of all movements of Livestock. All records are stored as a PDF or CSV and can be easily transferred.

isWorkSaftey.title: Work Safety
isWorkSaftey.description: Access to our complete record of all movements of Grain, Stockfeed or Fodder. All records are stored as a PDF or CSV and can be transferred easily
